mean_cn: adj. 大陆的，大陆性的；  n. 欧洲人
mean_en: of or in the continent of Europe, not including Britain and Ireland; connected with the main part of the N American continent; forming part of, or typical of, any of the seven main land masses of the earth
sentence: Earth was divided into seven continents by continental drift.
sentence_trans: 大陆漂移导致地球分为七个大洲。
word_etyma: continent大陆 + al形容词后缀 → continental大陆的
